info.name: peace
info.description:
It is a minor change of Fabrice shader and taken from here https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XdXyDr

O == NaN has been fixed.

renderpass.code:
// Original shader is taken from here https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XdXyDr
void mainImage(out vec4 O,vec2 U){O.xy = U / iResolution.y - .5; O = vec4(1) - .03/abs(length(O.xy) -.5) - .03/abs(O.x) - (length(O.xy) < .5 ? .03/abs(abs(O.x)+O.y): 0.);}
renderpass.name: Image
